name: Police Car Catch Criminal
description:
This is very dangerous off road car and jeep driving. You will can enjoy all driving. Your duty do not end just capturing that gangsters mafia rather you have to transfer them to police station. This is not an easy job to perform and you have to play with multiple dangers while performing these duties

Key Features:
• Amazing criminal city story.
• Realistic environment of the Vegas mafia city game.
• Smooth and easy control.
